title: Horror Marathon!
body: Just a short list for a marathon of horror movies, going from funny (bad) to scary (shit pants style) Ty darling (s)

replies.body:
Every now and then I marathon a bunch of Zombie Movies.

28 Days Later
28 Weeks Later
Zombieland
World War Z
Dawn of the Dead (2004 Remake)

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qXdF1hyN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-26T12:07:15.963+0000)
>
> Every now and then I marathon a bunch of Zombie Movies.
> 
> 28 Days Later
> 28 Weeks Later
> Zombieland
> World War Z
> Dawn of the Dead (2004 Remake)

nice, just planning on having a few friends ;) over

funny as in bad or funny as in spoofy ?
im a bit of a horror connoisseur so her you go
-the exorcist (original)
-halloween both originals and remakes are good
-friday the 13th (too many to talk about)
-insidious 1-2
- just saw the new poltergeist and i thought it was decent, not sure when it will be out for download
-the decent
- the conjuring
- the cabin in the woods
-  sinister
will have a think and come back to you on a few more
